department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: fan mounted as an album leaf; mountain retreat amongst a grove of pine trees at right, a path leads from the retreat to a larger group of pines between two mountain peaks where a scholar walks among the pines

title: Scholar's Mountain Retreat Amongst the Pines
